T02D2832:176b-0: @176b * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2832:176b-1: gsum la skyabs song sems bskyed ldan //
T02D2832:176b-3: skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan gyi //
T02D2832:176b-4: khang bur zhugs la rmi lam bsgom //
T02D2832:176b-5: btsun pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sku //
T02D2832:176b-6: btso ma gser gyi mdog ldan pa //
T02D2832:176b-7: zhal gcig phyag bzhi g-yas dang po //
T02D2832:176b-8: 'jigs skyob de bzhin g-yon du ni //
T02D2832:176b-9: padma dmar po gnyis pa gnyis //
T02D2832:176b-11: thugs kyi padmo kha zum pa'i //
T02D2832:176b-12: dbus su sems dngos hr'i: bsam bya //
T02D2832:176b-13: 'di 'dra'i 'phags pa nyid du bdag / skad cig tsam gyis bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2832:176b-14: dge dang brtse dang dad pa yis //
T02D2832:176b-15: rnal 'byor rgyal po gnyid log bya //
T02D2832:176b-16: gang tshe gnyid du nye ba na //
T02D2832:176b-17: hr'i: yang thig le gnyis la bsdu //
T02D2832:176b-18: rim gyis thig le 'og ma yang //
T02D2832:176b-19: de bzhin thig le gong ma la'o //
T02D2832:176b-20: de nas sna tshogs snang ba kun //
T02D2832:177a-2: pad dbus thig le nyag gcig la //
T02D2832:177a-3: chu la chu bzhag de bzhin bzhag / sems ni
T02D2832:177a-4: dri med zung 'jug bdag / dngos med dngos bral
T02D2832:177a-5: rnam par dag /'od gsal chen po nyid la nyid
T02D2832:177a-6: // mngon sum mi g-yo brtan par bzung //
T02D2832:177a-8: rnam pa thig le bde ba che //
T02D2832:177a-9: ngo bo kun du ma 'gags pa'o //
T02D2832:177a-10: sbyangs sdom can gyi chos gcig bzhed //
T02D2832:177a-11: de ltar rgyu 'dra chos kun rang bzhin rang bzhin med //
T02D2832:177a-12: gzhan la mi rag bdag nyid snying dkyil brtan par gnas //
T02D2832:177a-13: rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul gcig yin ma nor ba //
T02D2832:177a-14: bsgoms na de rjes rmi lam nyid du 'ang de mthong 'gyur //
T02D2832:177a-15: gal te sgrib tshogs bud shing tshang tshing gis bsgribs pas //
T02D2832:177a-16: yang dag ji bzhin de tshe mngon du ma gyur na 'ang //
T02D2832:177a-17: rnal 'byor rgyal pos re ba chad par mi bya ste //
T02D2832:177a-18: goms pa ma zad gcig tu brtson 'grus g-yel mi bya //
T02D2832:177a-19: mdun gyi mkha' la sangs rgyas byang chub sems dba' dang //
T02D2832:177a-20: nyan thos rang rgyal lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i //
T02D2832:177a-21: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi phung po ltar mthong 'gyur //
T02D2832:177a-22: de tshe de nas ring po mi thogs 'od gsal 'thob //
T02D2832:177a-23: rnam dag 'khor lo padmo 'dam nas skyes pa bzhin //
T02D2832:177a-24: gnyid kyis myos 'gyur ma rig gis bslad blo gros 'di //
T02D2832:177a-25: rang gis rang dben mkha' la nyi ltar spros bral du //
T02D2832:177a-26: rtsol bral med nyid rang dbang mngon sum 'char bar byed //
T02D2832:177a-27: rmi lam skyes bus rmi lam gyi //
T02D2832:177a-28: grong du dga' dang mya ngan la //
T02D2832:177a-29: bzung ba rlom sems tsam yin pa //
T02D2832:177a-30: de tshe de yis shes par 'gyur //
T02D2832:177a-31: me long gzugs brnyan gsal ba yis //
T02D2832:177a-32: yod dang med dang gnyis ka dang //
T02D2832:177a-33: gnyis ka ma yin brjod min pa //
T02D2832:177a-34: de tshe yid ches mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2832:177a-35: nam mkha'i ngos la dbang po'i gzhu //
T02D2832:177a-36: de bzhin ser sprin 'brug sgra can //
T02D2832:177a-37: thog mthar skye dang 'gags mi dmigs //
T02D2832:177a-38: 'od gsal la gnas skyes bus shes //
T02D2832:177a-39: ji ltar smig rgyu'i chu 'bab ba//
T02D2832:177a-40: shar sogs phyogs ni gang zhig nas //
T02D2832:177a-42: rmi lam mthong ba de yis shes //
T02D2832:177a-43: dril bu dang ni pi wang sgra //
T02D2832:177a-44: brag ca la sogs 'du byed ni //
T02D2832:177a-45: rnam par thar pa gsum gyis bsgos //
T02D2832:177a-46: zab mo rnam par dben pa yang //
T02D2832:177a-47: snang ba mun pa thibs po dang //
T02D2832:177b-1: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser bzhin du //
T02D2832:177b-2: dri bral rnam par dag pa rmad //
T02D2832:177b-3: ji srid 'dzin pa mang po la //
T02D2832:177b-4: zad dang mi skye bsre ba yis //
T02D2832:177b-5: ro gcig nyid du sbyor shes pa //
T02D2832:177b-6: rmi lam las gzhan rnal 'byor min //
T02D2832:177b-7: de ni sad pa nyid na yang //
T02D2832:177b-8: yid kyi dbang po tshim pa dang //
T02D2832:177b-9: 'dod pa'i sred pa las blo zlog / chos 'di brjod pa tsam rtogs so //
T02D2832:177b-10: de ltar gzung dang 'dzin pa yi //
T02D2832:177b-11: dri ma dri ma bral ba dang //
T02D2832:177b-12: bral ba rang bzhin med pa yang //
T02D2832:177b-13: yid kyis mngon par 'du mi byed //
T02D2832:177b-14: 'phags pa'i mig ces bshad pa ste //
T02D2832:177b-15: spyan ras gzigs kyi mthu yis so //
